name: Bimbo Sequencer 2
storyline: Someone has escaped the bimbofication facility! Transform them before they get away!
summary:
Bimbo Sequencer 2 is an adult transformation puzzle game. Funded via Patreon and inspired by EYEZMAZE's GROW games, it tasks the player with figuring out the correct combination to transform the protagonist into a bimbo.

Will you unlock the perfect bimbo or will you turn her into something else...?
